## Participant.vision property

The vision control stats of the participant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly vision: {
        controlWardsUsed: number;
        sightWardsBought: number;
        controlWardsBought: number;
        wardsKilled: number;
        wardsPlaced: number;
        score: number;
    };
```
